name: HTML Form
template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Murrelektronik Node-RED Impact67 Pro Auto Configuration Tool</title>
    <style>
        :root {
            --background-color: #f4f4f4;
            --border-color: #e5e5e5;
            --primary-color: #4d9b17;
            --secondary-color: #6ebe37;
            --dark-color: #014d0c;
            --light-text-color: #fff;
            --medium-text-color: #969696;
            --dark-text-color: #555;
            --navigation-sub-selected-border-color: #555;
            --navigation-sub-selected-text-color: #555;
            --font-family: 'Calibri', 'Helvetica Neue';
        }

        body {
            font-family: var(--font-family);
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            margin: 0px;
        }

        .header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            /* Center align items vertically */
            background-color: var(--dark-color);
            height: 80px;
            padding: 0;
            color: var(--light-text-color);
            width: 100%;
            justify-content: space-between;
            /* Ensure space between elements */
            font-weight: bold;
            /* Make the header bold */
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            /* Increase the font size */
        }

        .logo-container {
            padding-left: 10px;
            /* Add 10px padding to the left */
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            /* Center align items vertically */
        }

        .logo-container svg {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
        }

        #header-title {
            margin-left: 20px;
            /* Add 20px margin to the left */
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            /* Center align items vertically */
        }

        .language-button {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            /* Center align items vertically */
            margin-right: 10px;
            /* Add 10px margin to the right */
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            color: var(--primary-color);
            border: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            position: relative;
            /* Ensure the language menu is positioned relative to the button */
        }

        .language-menu {
            display: none;
            position: absolute;
            /* Position the menu absolutely */
            top: 100%;
            /* Position it below the button */
            right: 0;
            /* Align it to the right edge of the button */
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            border: 2px solid var(--primary-color);
            border-radius: 10px;
            padding: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }


        .language-menu div {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .language-menu div svg {
            width: 16px;
            /* Adjust size as needed */
            height: 16px;
            /* Adjust size as needed */
            margin-left: 5px;
            /* Space between text and icon */
            vertical-align: middle;
        }

        .language-menu div:hover {
            background-color: var(--background-color);
        }

        .language-menu .current {
            font-weight: bold;
        }


        .language-button i {
            margin-right: 10px;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            font-size: 16px;
            /* Ensure the globe icon displays correctly */
        }

        .language-button span {
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        @keyframes fadeInOut {

            0%,
            100% {
                opacity: 0;
            }

            10%,
            90% {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }

        .language-button span {
            animation: fadeInOut 3s infinite;
        }

        .nav-menu-top {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
            background-color: var(--primary-color);
            color: var(--light-text-color);
        }

        .nav-menu-bottom {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
            background-color: var(--secondary-color);
            color: var(--light-text-color);
            height: 36px;
        }

        .nav-option {
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 10px;
        }

        .nav-option-active {
            background-color: var(--secondary-color);
        }

        .nav-option.nav-sub-option.v-link-active {
            border-bottom: 4px solid var(--navigation-sub-selected-border-color);
            color: var(--navigation-sub-selected-text-color);
        }

        .container {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        .section {
            background-color: white;
            padding: 20px;
            margin: 20px;
            flex: 1;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .log-files a {
            display: block;
            margin: 5px 0;
            color: var(--primary-color);
            text-decoration: none;
        }

        .footer {
            position: fixed;
            bottom: 0px;
            width: 100%;
            min-height: 50px;
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            border-top: 2px solid var(--secondary-color);
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }

        .footer-status,
        .footer-information {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .footer-box {
            margin-left: 20px;
        }

        .footer-label {
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        #upload-section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            height: 100vh;
            /* Adjust as needed */
        }

        #csv-upload-list {
            background-color: #fdfbfb;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            border-collapse: collapse;
            width: 50%;
            /* Adjust as needed */
            margin: auto;
            /* Center the table */
        }

        #csv-upload-list caption {
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            /* Set the background color */
            padding: 11px 20px;
            color: var(--dark-text-color);
            font-weight: 700;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            /* Add border */
            border-bottom: none;
            border-top-left-radius: 4px;
            border-top-right-radius: 4px;
            margin-bottom: 0;
            /* Remove the bottom margin */
        }

        #csv-upload-list th,
        #csv-upload-list td {
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            /* Ensure borders are visible */
            padding: 10px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        #csv-upload-list th {
            background-color: #fdfbfb;
            color: var(--dark-text-color);
        }

        #logs-section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            height: 100vh;
            /* Adjust as needed */
        }

        #log-content-table {
            background-color: #fdfbfb;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            border-collapse: collapse;
            width: 80%;
            /* Adjust as needed */
            margin: auto;
            /* Center the table */
        }

        #log-content-table caption {
            background-color: var(--background-color);
            /* Set the background color */
            padding: 11px 20px;
            color: var(--dark-text-color);
            font-weight: 700;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            /* Add border */
            border-bottom: none;
            border-top-left-radius: 4px;
            border-top-right-radius: 4px;
            margin-bottom: 0;
            /* Remove the bottom margin */
        }

        #log-content-table th,
        #log-content-table td {
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            /* Ensure borders are visible */
            padding: 10px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        #log-content-table th {
            background-color: #fdfbfb;
            color: var(--dark-text-color);
        }

        #log-content-table td {
            vertical-align: top;
            /* Align content to the top */
        }

        #fileContent {
            white-space: pre-wrap;
            /* Ensure the log content wraps */
            text-align: left;
            /* Align text to the left */
        }


        #spinner {
            display: none;
            text-align: center;
        }

        #spinner svg rect {
            fill: var(--primary-color);
        }
    </style>
</head>

    <script>
    const translations = {
            en: {
                'upload-title': 'Upload CSV File',
                'upload-button': 'Upload',
                'log-title': 'Log Files'
            }

            ,
            de: {
                'upload-title': 'CSV-Datei hochladen',
                'upload-button': 'Hochladen',
                'log-title': 'Protokolldateien'
            }

            ,
            it: {
                'upload-title': 'Carica file CSV',
                'upload-button': 'Carica',
                'log-title': 'File di log'
            }

            ,
            pt: {
                'upload-title': 'Carregar arquivo CSV',
                'upload-button': 'Carregar',
                'log-title': 'Arquivos de log'
            }

            ,
            zh: {
                'upload-title': ' CSV ',
                'upload-button': '',
                'log-title': ''
            }
        }

            ;

        const languages = ["Language",
            "Sprache",
            "Lingua",
            "Lngua",
            ""];
        const languageButton = document.querySelector('.language-button');
        const languageMenu = document.getElementById('language-menu');
        const languageText = document.getElementById('language-text');
        const currentlanguageText = document.getElementById('language-menu-current');

        let currentLanguageIndex =0;

        languageButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
            languageMenu.style.display = languageMenu.style.display === 'block' ? 'none' : 'block';
        });

        languageMenu.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
            if (event.target.tagName === 'DIV') {
                const selectedLanguage = event.target.getAttribute('data-lang');
                currentlanguageText.textContent = "Current: " + event.target.textContent.trim();
                languageMenu.style.display = 'none';
                changeLanguage(selectedLanguage);
            }
        });

        function changeLanguage(language) {
            document.querySelectorAll('[data-translate]').forEach(element => {
                const key = element.getAttribute('data-translate');
                element.textContent = translations[language][key];
            });
        }

        function updateLanguageText() {
            currentLanguageIndex = (currentLanguageIndex + 1) % languages.length;
            languageText.textContent = languages[currentLanguageIndex];
        }

        setInterval(updateLanguageText, 3000); // Change language every 5 seconds

        document.querySelectorAll('.nav-option').forEach(option => {
            option.addEventListener('click', () => {
                document.querySelectorAll('.nav-option').forEach(opt => opt.classList.remove('nav-option-active'));
                option.classList.add('nav-option-active');

                if (option.id === 'isdu-auto-config') {
                    document.getElementById('isdu-auto-config-section').style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('information-section').style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('nav-menu-bottom').innerHTML = ` <div class="nav-option nav-sub-option v-link-active" >Upload</div> <div class="nav-option nav-sub-option" >Info</div> <div class="nav-option nav-sub-option" >Logs</div> `;
                    document.getElementById('upload-section').style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('info-section').style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('logs-section').style.display = 'none';
                }

                else if (option.id === 'information') {
                    document.getElementById('isdu-auto-config-section').style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('information-section').style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('nav-menu-bottom').innerHTML = ` <div class="nav-option nav-sub-option" >Help</div> <div class="nav-option nav-sub-option" >About</div> `;
                    document.getElementById('help-section').style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('about-section').style.display = 'none';
                }

                document.querySelectorAll('.nav-sub-option').forEach(subOption => {
                    subOption.addEventListener('click', () => {
                        document.querySelectorAll('.nav-sub-option').forEach(subOpt => subOpt.classList.remove('v-link-active'));
                        subOption.classList.add('v-link-active');

                        if (subOption.textContent.trim() === 'Upload') {
                            document.getElementById('upload-section').style.display = 'block';
                            document.getElementById('info-section').style.display = 'none';
                            document.getElementById('logs-section').style.display = 'none';
                        }

                        else if (subOption.textContent.trim() === 'Info') {
                            document.getElementById('upload-section').style.display = 'none';
                            document.getElementById('info-section').style.display = 'block';
                            document.getElementById('logs-section').style.display = 'none';
                        }

                        else if (subOption.textContent.trim() === 'Logs') {
                            document.getElementById('upload-section').style.display = 'none';
                            document.getElementById('info-section').style.display = 'none';
                            document.getElementById('logs-section').style.display = 'block';
                            fetchLogFiles(); // Automatically update the file list
                        }

                        else if (subOption.textContent.trim() === 'Help') {
                            document.getElementById('help-section').style.display = 'block';
                            document.getElementById('about-section').style.display = 'none';
                        }

                        else if (subOption.textContent.trim() === 'About') {
                            document.getElementById('help-section').style.display = 'none';
                            document.getElementById('about-section').style.display = 'block';
                        }
                    });
                });
            });
        });

        // Auto-select ISDU Auto Config - Upload on load
        document.getElementById('isdu-auto-config').click();
        document.querySelector('.nav-sub-option.v-link-active').click();

        // Handle form submission and reload page
        document.getElementById('uploadForm').addEventListener('submit', function (event) {
            event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default form submission

            // Disable the input and button
            const fileInput = document.querySelector('input[name="csvFile"]');
            const uploadButton = document.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
            //fileInput.disabled = true;
            //uploadButton.disabled = true;
            fileInput.style.display = 'none';
            uploadButton.style.display = 'none';

            // Show the spinner
            const spinner = document.getElementById('spinner');
            spinner.style.display = 'inline-block';

            var formData = new FormData(this);

            fetch('/upload', {
                method: 'POST',
                body: formData

            }).then(response => {
                if (response.ok) {
                    window.location.reload(); // Reload the page upon successful submission
                }

                else {
                    alert('File upload failed.');
                    // Re-enable the input and button if upload fails
                    fileInput.disabled = false;
                    uploadButton.disabled = false;
                    spinner.style.display = 'none';
                }

            }).catch(error => {
                console.error('Error:', error);
                alert('An error occurred.');
                // Re-enable the input and button if an error occurs
                fileInput.disabled = false;
                uploadButton.disabled = false;
                spinner.style.display = 'none';
            });
        });

        // New functionality for log files
        function fetchLogFiles() {
            fetch('/files').then(response => response.json()).then(data => {
                const fileDropdown = document.getElementById('fileDropdown');
                fileDropdown.innerHTML = '';

                if (data && data.length > 0) {
                    data.forEach(file => {
                        const option = document.createElement('option');
                        option.value = file.path;
                        option.textContent = file.name;
                        fileDropdown.appendChild(option);
                    });
                }

                else {
                    const option = document.createElement('option');
                    option.textContent = 'No files found';
                    fileDropdown.appendChild(option);
                }
            }).catch(error => console.error('Error fetching files:', error));
        }

        document.getElementById('loadFiles').addEventListener('click', fetchLogFiles);

document.getElementById('viewFile').addEventListener('click', () => {
    const selectedFile = document.getElementById('fileDropdown').value;
    fetch(`/readfile?filename=${encodeURIComponent(selectedFile)}`)
    .then(response => response.json())
    .then(data => {
        const formattedData = JSON.stringify(data, null, 2);
        document.getElementById('fileContent').textContent = formattedData;
    })
    .catch(error => console.error('Error reading file:', error));
});

document.getElementById('downloadFile').addEventListener('click', () => {
    const selectedFile = document.getElementById('fileDropdown').value;
    window.location.href = `/download?filename=${encodeURIComponent(selectedFile)}`;
});



    </script>
</body>

</html>
